entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light near noon. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Snow beginning near midnight. Local blowing snow overnight. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
